titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2528) making appropriations for military quality of life functions of the Department of Defense, military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-97, by Mr. Gingrey.
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 44.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 298.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 194 (Roll no. 223).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/26/2005--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2528) making appropriations for military quality of life functions of the Department of Defense, military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006.
